title: AJPOM1
author: AJPOM1
created_time: June 30, 2023, 10:18:52 AMLast edit: July 15, 2023, 12:27:11 PM by AJPOM1
content: I have the following for sale ideally would like to sell as a full package in the UK1. DCX Immersion system 40kw i think with mineral oil and dry cooler 2.Four of Antminer S173.Three of Antminer T174.One of Antminer S17 plus5.Four of love core miners 25t6.Three of Avalon 1066 50t7.Twenty of Antminer s9s - SOLD8.Three of Antminer S15s - SOLDAlso have spare boards and fans and lots of other spares. I'm moving premises and don't have the space. Everything is running and can be shown running. Once the machines have left my premises there will be no returns. I have some more machines s17 and t17 in for repair with D-TECH. I can include these in the sale should you want moreOFFERS

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: I'm not an interested buyer due to location, But I'd love to see this setup, can you upload some pics?
